svcproc.title: ELECTRIC LOCK - RIGHT AND LEFT, OR WITH REMOTE KEYLESS ENTRY (RKE)
svcproc.para: Power locks, with controls in the driver and passenger doors, will lock or unlock all doors.

If the remote keyless entry (RKE) option is installed on the vehicle, the key FOB transmitter communicates with the RKE receiver module antenna to unlock or lock the doors and courtesy lights for one minute or until the ignition switch is turned on. The RKE memory in the receiver learns the transmitter codes from the key FOBS (transmitters) and only recognizes those which it has learned in the programming process. Each vehicle's has the ability to learn up to four transmitter codes allowing the vehicle to be accessed by four different key FOBS. Each key FOB has a unique code which can be learned by any number of RKE equipped vehicles.
